snippet: Matt Kenseth has been a consistent driver, but this season he is winning races. He holds a 3-point margin over the five-time champion Jimmie Johnson with six races remaining.
lead_paragraph: Matt Kenseth has been a consistent driver, but this season he is winning races. He holds a 3-point margin over the five-time champion Jimmie Johnson with six races remaining.

headline.main: After Steady Presence for Years, Kenseth Is Driver to Beat in Chase
headline.print_headline: After Steady Presence for Years, Kenseth Is Driver to Beat in Chase
